title: Fast-track VIP tickets with Google Sheets, ClickUp, and Telegram
description:
## Description:
Accelerate VIP support handling with this n8n workflow template that automatically identifies high-priority customers and ensures their tickets get instant attention.

This automation pulls customer ticket data from Google Sheets, checks for the VIP tag, and seamlessly creates a priority task in ClickUp, while sending an instant Telegram alert to your team.

## What This Template Does:
 üîç Detects VIP-tagged customers in real time
 üìù Creates high-priority ClickUp tasks for their tickets
 üì± Sends Telegram alerts with ticket details (subject + requester email)
 üìä Organizes VIP workload for easy tracking in ClickUp

## Built-in logic ensures:
 ‚Ä¢ Only VIP-tagged customers are escalated
 ‚Ä¢ Priority tasks are auto-assigned without delays
 ‚Ä¢ Teams receive instant notifications for fast response
 ‚Ä¢ No missed high-value customer interactions

## Requirements:
 ‚Ä¢ Google Sheets API credentials
 ‚Ä¢ ClickUp API credentials
 ‚Ä¢ Telegram Bot token & Chat ID
 ‚Ä¢ n8n instance (self-hosted or cloud)

## Perfect For:
Customer support teams, sales organizations, and service-based businesses who need to prioritize VIP tickets instantly and streamline customer experience.
